prepared_by: Ramirez Structural Inc — Jose Ramirez, PE
description: Structural typical details sheet with 6 detail drawings covering shearwall assemblies (sheathing on both sides and one side), shearwall intersections, tie plate bolting/anchor bolts, shearwall typical plate, and holdown/sill anchor configurations for slab and raised footings.
key_content: Detail 7: Shearwall assembly — sheathing on BOTH sides, edge and field nailing, holdown at base, anchor bolt connection
Detail 5: Shearwall assembly — sheathing on ONE side, edge and field nailing, holdown at base, anchor bolt connection
Detail 1: Shearwall intersections — corner and T-intersection framing, blocking and nailing patterns
Detail 3: Tie plate bolting & anchor bolts — bolt configurations, edge distances, embedment details
Detail 4: Shearwall typical plate — standard shearwall top plate connection
Detail 8: Holdown and sill anchor — four sub-details: slab detail, slab footing, raised detail, raised footing
Holdown hardware bracket connecting post to foundation with anchor bolt embedment
Sill plate connection details at both slab-on-grade and raised/stem wall foundation types
NOT SHOWN: specific shearwall schedule with mark numbers, PLF ratings, and nail spacing per mark (likely on a separate sheet)
NOT SHOWN: specific holdown schedule with mark numbers, hardware models, and uplift values (likely on a separate sheet)

drawing_zones.content: Tie plate bolting & anchor bolts — bolt configurations and edge distances
Shearwall intersections — corner and T-intersection framing details
Shearwall assembly 1 — sheathing on both sides, full wall section with holdown
Shearwall assembly 1 — sheathing on one side, full wall section with holdown
Shearwall typical plate — standard shearwall top plate detail
Holdown and sill anchor — slab detail, slab footing, raised detail, raised footing
APPROVED stamp — City of Long Beach, Anthony Montez
